channel.title: Donor Points

item.title: Donor Points
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I have this code to show how many donor points the player has left but it doesn’t work, it just shows ‘Donator Points:’ how can I fix this?

if (officialClient == true){ sendQuest("@blu@Donor points: "+Dpoints, 19507); }}

Read full topic
